GeneralError.Message: A general error has occurred. See Resolution for details.
GeneralError.Resolution: Retry the operation; if the problem persists, contact the service provider.

ResourceNotFound.Description: The requested resource was not found.
ResourceNotFound.Resolution: Provide a valid resource identifier and resubmit the request.

MethodNotAllowed.Description: The operation is not supported on the target resource.
MethodNotAllowed.Message: The HTTP method is not allowed on the target resource.
MethodNotAllowed.Resolution: Use an allowed HTTP method for the target resource and resubmit the request.

Unauthorized.Description: Authentication has failed or credentials were not provided.
Unauthorized.Message: The request could not be authorized.
Unauthorized.Resolution: Provide valid credentials and resubmit the request.

InsufficientPrivilege.Description: The requester does not have the required privileges.
InsufficientPrivilege.Message: The request failed because the requester does not have the necessary privileges.
InsufficientPrivilege.Resolution: Resubmit the request using an account with the required privileges.

MalformedJSON.Message: The request body contained malformed JSON and could not be parsed.
MalformedJSON.Resolution: Correct the JSON payload formatting and resubmit the request.

PropertyMissing.Description: A required property was missing from the request payload.
PropertyMissing.Message: A required property is missing from the request payload.
PropertyMissing.Resolution: Include all required properties in the request and resubmit.

PropertyValueNotInList.Description: The value provided for a property is not in the allowed list of values.
PropertyValueNotInList.Message: The value for the property is not in the list of acceptable values.
PropertyValueNotInList.Resolution: Use one of the documented allowed values for the property and resubmit the request.

ResourceCannotBeCreated.Description: The resource could not be created.
ResourceCannotBeCreated.Message: The service was unable to create the resource with the supplied data.
ResourceCannotBeCreated.Resolution: Verify the request data and permissions, correct any issues, and resubmit the request.

NotImplemented.Description: The requested operation is not implemented by the service.
NotImplemented.Message: The operation is not implemented by the service.
NotImplemented.Resolution: Remove the unsupported operation from the request or await a future implementation.

InternalError.Description: An internal error occurred while processing the request.
InternalError.Message: The service detected an internal error while processing the request.
InternalError.Resolution: Retry the operation; if the problem persists, contact the service provider.
